attributes.action: show solidarity with the public sector and award MP's a pay rise below the rate of inflation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In view of the fact that the Government has awarded some public sector workers a pay rise below the rate of inflation I suggest that the Prime Minister should show solidarity with the public sector and abandon the usual inflation busting pay rises for politicians and instead peg any pay rises for MP's to below the rate of inflation.

rejection.details: there are already petitions on the site about MPs pay
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
